ChatWarningKickMessage: You are {red}idle / AFK{white}. Move or you will be {lime}kicked{white} in {blue}{timeAmount}{white} seconds.
ChatWarningMoveMessage: You are {red}idle / AFK{white}. Move or you will be {lime}moved{white} to SPEC in {blue}{timeAmount}{white} seconds.
ChatWarningKillMessage: You are {red}idle / AFK{white}. Move or you will be {lime}killed{white} in {blue}{timeAmount}{white} seconds.
AntiCampSlayMessage: {grey}{playerName}{white} was {lime}killed{white} for camping in zone {green}@{zoneName}{white} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{white}.
AntiCampSlapMessage: {grey}{playerName}{white} was {lime}punished{white} with {red}{slapAmount}{white} damage for camping in zone {green}@{zoneName}{white} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{white}.
AntiCampSlayWarningMessage: Stop camping in zone {green}@{zoneName}{white} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{white}, or you will be {lime}killed{white} in {blue}{timeAmount}{white} seconds.
AntiCampSlapWarningMessage: Stop camping in zone {green}@{zoneName}{white} with weapon {lime}{weaponName}{white}, or you will be {lime}punished{white} with {red}{slapAmount}{white} damage in {blue}{timeAmount}{white} seconds.
